txt.en: 'We Rangers thank you for your efforts. May the mountain slopes once again be quiet and peaceful.'
Brangil can be found in Tinnudir.\n\nYou should speak with Brangil.
Droghus, a Gauradan spirit-caller has allied with the Angmarim, in order to find a powerful artifact within the hills of Evendim.
Droghus can be found somewhere in Evendim.\n\nYou should defeat Droghus.

'The Gauredain across the lake are not our allies nor our greatest concern. However, the renewed threat in Ann√∫minas has angered these mountain men. Their high chieftain, Droghus, commands their numbers. You must be careful though, he also has command over wolves as though he were a wolf himself.'
